question: During the viceroyship of Lord Chlemsford which of the following events took place?
explanation: Lord Chlemsford (1916-1921): The enactment of the Government of India, 1919 (Montague-Chelmsfor Reforms) which introduced dyarchy in the provincess, Rowlatt Act (1919), Jallianwala Bagh Massacre (1919) and Non-Cooperation Movement were some of the important events in his period.
